n-gram representation.from sentence: As we can see , the n-gram representation with location masking achieves slightly better results over the left - right context .

POS information.from sentence: Also , by adding POS information , we gain an increase in the performance .

Separating.from sentence: Separating the left and the right context ( LR - Left - Right ) for BoW representation , does not improve the performance .

two variations of LSTM.from sentence: Amongst the two variations of LSTM , the model with final state embeddings does slightly better than the model where we use the embeddings at the location index , however they are not significantly different ( with a p valueless than 0.01 ) .

interesting to note.from sentence: It is interesting to note that the best LSTM model is not superior to logistic regression model , especially in terms of AUC .

logistic regression model.from sentence: Another interesting observation is that the F 1 measure for logistic regression model with n-grams and POS information is very low while this model 's performance is superior to other models in terms of AUC .
